price: ដោយម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់របស់យើងនៅជិតគេជាងពួកអ្នកទៅ ទៀត ក៏ប៉ុន្ដែពួកអ្នកមើលមិនឃើញឡើយ។
arabic: وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wanaḥnu aqrabu ilayhi minkum walākin lā tub'ṣirūna
